TopicTitle: Sky-sweeper Class Frigate from Zokesia Skunkworks !

Articles.Content:
Sky-sweeper Class Frigate

Another addition to the zokesia Naval Department. The Sky-sweeper Class Frigate is an Anti air gun boat. Made for speed and agility this boat can cruise at 50 m/s (could go more but then you start to fly and to avoid going to fast set trim as far down as possible and keep throttle at a little more than 1/3). Armed with 4 double barreled AA guns and 1 rocket pod this boat can take out any airplane within its range (all weapons are just for show but the next boat will have a working rocket pod ).This boat has only 166 parts after ditching all the detachable runway gear. runs on 1 jet engine and has a crew of 1. Hope you like it (for easier driving there is a probe hidden in the hull just under the landing pod use this if you wnat to use A D to turn and not Q E.)and as all my boats do this one does not make noise splashing noises.

Action groups

1-antennas (aa guns look better with antennas not deployed in my opinion)

my next boat will have one with a REAL rocket in it

you will love whats coming down the tube

At sea it's a battleship. In space it's a star destroyer
its missiles were just tested and reached 3.8 Km now all i have left is its detachable berthing legs and then it will be released
